Fangshan district of Beijing, formerly Fangshan county

sentences.english: Zhoukoudian is a village of Fangshan County, about 50km from Beijing .
sentences.chinese: 周口店是北京房山县的一个镇，距北京城约50公里。

sentences.english: Therefore, Sinolgis has currently established a green motorcade in Fangshan District in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 因此，华储现已在北京市房山区建立绿色车队。

sentences.english: He was born at Fangshan in Beijing.
Revitalize the slabstone factory and lie in the southwest of Fangshan of Beijing in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京振兴石板厂位于北京房山西南。

sentences.english: The southwestern district of Fangshan was the hardest hit.
sentences.chinese: 北京市西南部的房山区受灾最重。

sentences.english: Heavy rains triggered flash floods in Fangshan, Juma River flood peak discharge.
sentences.chinese: 暴雨引发山洪暴发，在房山拒马河洪峰流量。
